@@info: Here are translations that exist in <en> but not in <pl>.
After editing this file, you can run 'dart run slang apply --locale=pl' to quickly apply the newly added translations.

favoriteDeleteDialog.content: Czy na pewno chcesz usunąć z ulubionych "{name}"?
